function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in the distance respiratory droplets can travel","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to insufficient social distancing guidelines","Mitigation":"Research and establish precise guidelines for safe social distancing based on factors such as particle size, environmental conditions, and ventilation","Technologies":"Particle tracking software, environmental monitoring systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in confined spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of respiratory infectious disease transmission in confined spaces such as public transportations, offices, stores, and restaurants","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce ventilation rate guidelines for confined spaces, improve ventilation systems, and integrate air purifiers","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation rate monitors","People":"Occupants of confined spaces, building managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of control over probability of infection (PI) in relation to social distance and ventilation rate","Impact":"Inability to effectively control and reduce the probability of infection to a specified target level (e.g., 2%)","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research to establish clear correlations and guidelines for social distance, ventilation rate, and probability of infection, implement monitoring systems to track and control PI","Technologies":"Infection probability monitoring systems, data analytics for correlation analysis","People":"General public, policymakers, public health authorities","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"}]}
